channel.title: Curiosities on arun._space
channel.description: Recent content in Curiosities on arun._space

item.title: Meh.ai
item.description: Discover how Meh.ai revolutionizes browsing by turning Chrome into your personal AI sidekick.

item.title: K-Armed Bandit Problem: From Casinos to Wall Street
item.description: An engaging exploration of the k-armed bandit problem, covering key concepts like exploration vs. exploitation, continuous rewards, and non-stationary environments.

item.title: OpenAPI to Function Calling: A Comprehensive Guide
item.description: Learn how to convert OpenAPI specs to AI-usable functions for smarter API interactions.

item.title: Defensive Distillation
item.description: An exploration of defensive distillation techniques to protect neural networks against adversarial attacks
